findings.title: Optimization opportunity in `isEmptyString(name)` check
findings.description: The `isEmptyString(name)` check can be removed because the same check happens in the `nameExists()` function, which will save gas.

findings.title: Typo in `NAME_NOT_FOUND` error
findings.description: Incorrect error message `NAME_NOT_FOUND` should be replaced with something like `NAME_ALREADY_ADDED`.

findings.title: Optimization opportunity in `isEmptyString(name)` check
findings.description: The `isEmptyString(name)` check can be removed because the same check happens in the `nameExists()` function, which will save gas.

findings.title: Allowing zero sender balance
findings.description: The `balance.amount[0]` is still allowed to be zero, even though there is no reason to allow that. Consider adding a requirement for sender balance to be positive.

findings.title: Misleading comment about timelock expiration
findings.description: The comment 'If timelock is nonzero and has expired, payment is canceled' is misleading because Resolve will be reverted in this case, forcing the caller to supply zero preImage, and if zero preImage is supplied then expiration will not be checked.

findings.title: Condition will always fail with `NONZERO_LOCKHASH`
findings.description: The expiration part of the condition didn't pass, then it will always fail with `NONZERO_LOCKHASH`.

findings.title: Using `keccak256` instead of `sha256` for optimization
findings.description: Consider updating off-chain code to use `keccak256` as it is cheaper than `sha256`.

findings.title: Gas inefficiency in dispute initiation
findings.description: Every new asset on the channel adds 3196 gas to the dispute initiation, which can lead to limitations in case of a low block gas limit.

findings.title: Undisputable transfer due to not checking for existing disputes
findings.description: When signing a new `transferId` make sure it is not already disputed. Not doing so will result in the transfer being undisputable, potentially resulting in loss of funds.

findings.title: Channel cannot proceed during dispute resolution
findings.description: The channel cannot proceed until the dispute is expired, even if both parties already defunded every asset/transfer they intended to.

findings.title: Lack of function to end dispute by mutual agreement
findings.description: In the current implementation, once a dispute is started the channel cannot proceed until the dispute is expired, even if both parties already defunded every asset/transfer they intended to. It is possible to add a function that can explicitly end the dispute by mutual agreement, without waiting for the expiration.
